evolution of the meta-assembly programa generalized assembler called a meta-assembler"is described the meta-assembler is defined and factors which contributed to its evolution are presented how a meta-assembler is made to function as an assembly program is described finally the implicationof meta-assemblers on compiler design is discussed.cacm march 1966ferguson d e.ca660312 jb march 3 1978 11:56 am1358 5 14601460 5 14601460 5 14601460 5 14601781 5 1460123 6 1460196 6 1460919 6 1460990 6 14601007 6 14601046 6 14601131 6 14601139 6 14601140 6 14601149 6 14601198 6 14601215 6 14601223 6 14601265 6 14601303 6 14601323 6 14601358 6 14601366 6 14601421 6 14601460 6 14601460 6 14601462 6 14601463 6 14601467 6 14601468 6 14601477 6 14601491 6 14601496 6 14601531 6 14601535 6 14601565 6 14601601 6 14601602 6 14601613 6 14601614 6 14601626 6 14601641 6 14601787 6 14601788 6 1460205 6 1460205 6 1460224 6 1460249 6 1460288 6 1460316 6 1460381 6 1460398 6 146011 6 1460404 6 1460410 6 1460463 6 1460464 6 1460483 6 14603184 6 14603184 6 14603188 6 1460584 6 1460600 6 1460680 6 1460691 6 1460729 6 1460763 6 1460799 6 1460799 6 1460
